description: End-to-end project management and workflow tracking system for a water pump company. Tracks projects from lead/quotation through procurement, installation, commissioning, handover, invoicing and service with date-based milestone tracking, delays calculation, master data references and user access control.

sheets.name: Projects - Main Workflow

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Record creation timestamp (must be first column)

columns.name: Overall Status
columns.description: High-level status (e.g., Not Started, In Progress, Completed, On Hold)

columns.name: Created On
columns.description: Record creation date (duplicate of Timestamp for convenience)

columns.name: Current Stage
columns.description: Calculated or set current stage name (derived from last completed stage)

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 1 = Actual1 - Planned1 (formula)

columns.name: Delay2
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 2 = Actual2 - Planned2 (formula)

columns.name: Delay3
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 3 = Actual3 - Planned3 (formula)

columns.name: Planned4
columns.description: Stage 4 planned completion date (Delivery to Site)

columns.name: Delay4
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 4 = Actual4 - Planned4 (formula)

columns.name: Delay5
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 5 = Actual5 - Planned5 (formula)

columns.name: Planned6
columns.description: Stage 6 planned completion date (Electrical Hookup & Commissioning)

columns.name: Delay6
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 6 = Actual6 - Planned6 (formula)

columns.name: Delay7
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 7 = Actual7 - Planned7 (formula)

columns.name: Delay8
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 8 = Actual8 - Planned8 (formula)

columns.name: Delay9
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 9 = Actual9 - Planned9 (formula)

columns.name: Delay10
columns.description: Days delay for Stage 10 = Actual10 - Planned10 (formula)

stages.stage_description: Capture lead details and quotation issuance.
Customer confirms order; PO and order acceptance.
Procure pump and materials from vendors; track POs.
Track shipment, delivery notes and site receipt.
Site preparation, civil works and physical installation of pump.
Electrical connection, wiring and commissioning activities.
Functional testing, performance verification and customer acceptance.
Handover of documentation, training and warranty initiation.
Issue invoices and track payment collection.
Post-installation service, preventive maintenance and breakdown support.

sheets.description: Primary workflow sheet tracking the full lifecycle of each pump project. All stages are represented as grouped columns in sequential order. Timestamp is the first column as required.

sheets.name: Customer Master
sheets.description: Customer master data used for lookups in projects

sheets.name: Pump Model Master
sheets.description: Reference data for pump models, specifications and SKUs

sheets.name: Inventory Master
sheets.description: Inventory SKUs, stock on hand and warehouse locations

sheets.name: Service Team Master
sheets.description: Teams and technicians for installation and maintenance

sheets.name: Dropdown Values
sheets.description: Reusable dropdowns (Priority, Status, Payment Status, Yes/No, etc.)

sheets.name: Import Dump
sheets.description: Temporary sheet for bulk import and staging of project records
